mapper.select: SELECT ename FROM emp WHERE empno = #{empNo}
Select * from emp where comm is null
select ename, comm from emp where ename like "%LL%"
select ename, hiredate from emp e where hiredate between '1980-12-17' and '1982-01-23'
select ename, sal from emp where deptno = 10 or deptno = 30
select * from emp where MGR is null
select ename , hiredate from emp where DATE_FORMAT(HIREDATE,'%Y') = #{year}
select ename, job from ( select max(sal) as maxSal from emp where DATE_FORMAT(HIREDATE,'%m') = '12') as e, emp where sal = e.maxSal and date_format(HIREDATE,'%m') = '12'
select e.ename , e.hiredate , e.sal from (select min(hiredate), hiredate from emp group by hiredate) as e, emp where job = #{job}
